Don't be afraid to explore alternative airlines and routes. Sometimes, flying into a nearby airport and taking a shuttle or train can be cheaper than flying directly into your preferred airport.

• A Börsenplatz is a physical location, while a Börse is an institution that facilitates trading activities.
• A Börsenplatz can be found in various cities, but it is not necessarily an active trading floor. A Börse, however, is a specific institution that carries out trading activities on a regular basis.
